io.werval.spi.dev

Class DevShellSPIAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.werval.spi.dev.DevShellSPIAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DevShellSPI 

    public class DevShellSPIAdapter
extends Object
implements DevShellSPI
    Adapter for DevShellSPI that listen to changes but has NOOP rebuild methods.

    Extend and override doRebuild() method to your will.

    Note that this is the werval HttpServer responsibility to trigger rebuilds.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.werval.spi.dev.DevShellSPI
